MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Frederick Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have conducted investigations to locate the fault on our underground cable network. Our engineers have now located the fault and are currently making repairs and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40am on the 11th of December 2020.
